task.title: Things to keep in mind when cooking vegan breakfast recipes
task.shortdesc: A short list of troubleshooting topics that relate to Armando's Breakfast Guide.

step.cmd: Make sure to use vegetable oil instead of animal fat when cooking.
Use fresh ingredients for better results, as plant foods don't retain quality as well as animal foods.
Research and master your recipes so you have a lot of options to cook quickly and effectively.

Make sure to make something substantial enough to sustain you at least until lunch. A lot of times when cooking vegan, people underestimate how much a serving is and end up starving themselves by mistake. Not eating enough is one of the most risky things about eating vegan.
